channel.title: lucid on Inductive Bias

item.title: Lucene 2.9 White Paper
item.description: Lucene 2.9 White Paper # Lucid recently published a white paper that explains the changes and improvements that the new 2.9 release incorporates. Interesting for all who are thinking about upgrading to the new lucene version or generally want to know what is going on at Lucene.
